articles.title: Queen Elizabeth makes surprise appearance at opening ceremony of London train line - CNN
articles.description: Britain's Queen Elizabeth II made a surprise public appearance at the opening ceremony of a long-awaited train line in London on Tuesday.
articles.content:
The monarch, walking with a stick, wore a bright yellow outfit and hat to visit the Elizabeth line, which is named in her honor.
